attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current lower limit for drivers to pass their test is 17. This is too young for a few reasons. Some teenagers are also learning about: 

1. Smoking. 

2. Drinking. 

3. Being sexually competitive with each other. 

This combined with the fact teenagers are subject to an intense course of exams in which pupils are very competitive could (and I'm sure does) cause accidents. 

This petition is for safer roads for everyone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
